answers.answer: I'm 21 weeks too and I'm the exact same way!
im only 7w2d and eat constanly and if i dont it seems like my stomach is super upset i swear im havin twins lol and i bet ive gained like 15lbs! it *****
lol woahhh! i was super nauseous at 7 weeks & loosing weight !!
Theres days well most days i feel that way. Usually my boyfriend takes me out to eat and i order 2plates i say its one for my baby girl ayleen and one for me lol

I remember feeling like that too around that stage of pregnancy, i think its normal, like baby is going through a growth spurt. I felt continously hungry until about 26 weeks, then the appetite settled down a little bit. Now i'm 35 weeks and feel starving again, but the worst thing is i have gestational diabetes and can't eat large portions of food, and def no sugar or yummy things! I say eat and enjoy it while you can!
Bump! I'm exactly the same as well! I thought I was being greedy lol, and just using my pregnancy to eat ALOT! Scared I'm going to let myself go so I think I need to reel it in before I get too big.
I'm starving every day from lunch till I go home, then I eat a small dinner and not much else.
I'm 21weeks and 2 days and I'm exactly the same lol!
this is crazy! right when i wake up im already starving lol i want this feeling to end already!!! lol

question: Is this normal? Does anyone else feel this way too? I'm 21 weeks & a couple of days,& EVERY hour im starving like i didnt even eat the whole day! It's crazy, I had an appointment today & I've gained 13 pounds within the last month. My weight before pregnancy was 120, now I'm at 137. I just feel like me eating TOO MUCH can be a bad thing? :/
title: starving every hour!
